idea:
Ujjman Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is Head Quartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Our core team is competent, well – organized and has experience of 4+ years in IT Industry. Ujjman Technologies has grown in strength and aim to win numerous accolades along the way. We provide people and companies from various fields to grow their business and clients as the Motto of the company is:

“Delivering IT Solutions on – time, Cost – effective, Quality in an Innovative way”.


Ujjman Technologies is a creative site that not only provides end-to-end sevices in Information Technology but our main goal is customer satisfaction. We deliver Software Products, Software Consulting, customized Software Products, Web Designing, Networking, PC Health Care and Business Process outsourcing for SME (small-to-medium enterprise). Technical Support and Digital Marketing with some value – added services are also provided.

“WE believe great services would lead to great business”

Ujjman Technologies is an Indian full-cycle business development company with specialty mastery and an attention on the most IT advances. Since 2015, we have been helping organizations accomplish their objectives with impactful, industry-particular programming arrangements. We the team who work for your business development. When you are thinking of a startup, we are thinking of you. Your company website design, software development, marketing, SEO and IT management are our responsibility.
“We Create, We Design and Make it Real – Ujjman Technologies”
name: UJJMAN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
